translations: v．减轻，缓和：使痛苦、忧虑、愤怒等减轻或消除。

sentences.sentence: Finally, my upstairs neighbor and freelance stylist extraordinaire, Roshawna Jackson assuages my dismay at being unable to master the art of the pose.
sentences.translation: 最后，请教我楼上的一位邻居，她是非凡的自由职业者造型师，罗莎娜·杰克逊减轻了我无力摆出艺术姿势的沮丧心情。

sentences.sentence: It assuages the sense of moral panic that has been the handmaiden of prohibition for a century. It is intended to reassure the parents of teenagers across the world.
sentences.translation: 它减轻了一个世纪来禁毒带来的道德痛苦，使全世界青少年的父母更加安心。
